top_comments_top.body: People can list things for whatever they want, doesnt mean its worth that or that people are willing to pay it.

Is it a misprint/wrong production?

There was a chicken nugget that was in an odd shape sold for 2000$, stuff that people see Jesus in it sells for lot of money. So yeah, some stuff gets sold, others don't.
Pretty sure I can go buy some Oreos right now for a few bucks. This seems like it's probably a bad deal.
